text: Mont-Dauphin is a commune in the Hautes-Alpes department. It is known for the Fortress of Mont-Dauphin. The fortress was listed as a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 2008. == Population == == Transport == === Road === The D137 and D137T roads pass through the commune. == References == Category:Communes in Hautes- Alpes
title: Mont-Dauphin
